20-0755.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes of the Housing Authority of the City of Long Beach, California Regular Meeting held Tuesday, Page 1 of 4TELECONFERENCE, 4:30 PMTUESDAY, AUGUST 11, 2020CITY OF LONG BEACHHOUSING AUTHORITY OF THE CITY OF LONG BEACH, CALIFORNIA MINUTESJuly 14, 2020.A motion was made by Commissioner Hudson, seconded by Vice Chair Pearce, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 6 - Zendejas, Mungo, Austin, Hudson, Pearce and RichardsonAbsent: 5 - Price, Supernaw, Andrews, Uranga and Tanzer2.

20-0756.summary: Recommendation to receive and file the Housing Authority Financial and Operational Performance Reports for May 2020.  (Citywide)A motion was made by Vice Chair Pearce, seconded by Chair Richardson, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 6 - Zendejas, Andrews, Austin, Hudson, Pearce and RichardsonAbsent: 5 - Price, Supernaw, Mungo, Uranga and Tanzer3.

20-0757.summary: Recommendation to authorize City Manager, or designee, to execute all documents necessary to amend Lease No. 26422 between Abbass and Shohreh Tousi, as individuals, and the Housing Authority of the City of Long Beach (Housing Authority), for office space located at 521 East 4th Street, for six additional months until March 31, 2021, with an option to further extend on a month to month basis beyond March 31, 2021.  (Citywide)Alison King, Deputy Executive Director, spoke; and presented the staff report.A motion was made by Commissioner Austin, seconded by Vice Chair Pearce, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 6 - Zendejas, Andrews, Austin, Hudson, Pearce and RichardsonAbsent: 5 - Price, Supernaw, Mungo, Uranga and TanzerPage 2 of 4TELECONFERENCE, 4:30 PMTUESDAY, AUGUST 11, 2020CITY OF LONG BEACHHOUSING AUTHORITY OF THE CITY OF LONG BEACH, CALIFORNIA MINUTES4.

20-0758.summary: Recommendation to authorize Housing Authority of the City of Long Beach (Housing Authority), or designee, to execute all documents necessary to amend to Contract No. 35530 with Gillis & Panichapan Architects, Inc., of Costa Mesa, CA, for as-needed space-planning architectural services, furnishing and delivering of office furniture and equipment layout, to increase the contract amount by $500,000, for a revised amount not to exceed $1,700,000;Adopt resolution authorizing Housing Authority, or designee, to execute a contract with AllSteel, Inc., of Muscatine, IA, for furnishing and delivering furniture, installation, and related services, on the same terms and conditions afforded to Region 4 Education Service Center, Contract No. R191802, through Omnia Partners, in an amount not to exceed $1,100,000, for a period of one year, with the option to renew for as long as the Omnia Partners contract is in effect, at the discretion of the Housing Authority; and A motion was made by Commissioner Zendejas, seconded by Vice Chair Pearce, to approve recommendation and adopt Resolution No. H.A. 01-20.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 6 - Zendejas, Andrews, Austin, Hudson, Pearce and RichardsonAbsent: 5 - Price, Supernaw, Mungo, Uranga and TanzerEnactment No: H.A. 01-20

20-0796.summary: Adopt resolution authorizing Housing Authority, or designee, to execute a contract with Haworth, Inc., of Holland, MI, for furniture, installation and related products and services on the same terms and conditions afforded to City of Charlotte, NC, Contract No. 2020000606, through Omnia Partners, in an amount not to exceed $700,000, for a period of one year, with the option to renew for as long as the Omnia Partners contract is in effect, at the discretion of the Housing Authority. (Citywide)Page 3 of 4TELECONFERENCE, 4:30 PMTUESDAY, AUGUST 11, 2020CITY OF LONG BEACHHOUSING AUTHORITY OF THE CITY OF LONG BEACH, CALIFORNIA MINUTESA motion was made by Commissioner Zendejas, seconded by Vice Chair Pearce, to approve recommendation and adopt Resolution No. H.A. 02-20.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 6 - Zendejas, Andrews, Austin, Hudson, Pearce and RichardsonAbsent: 5 - Price, Supernaw, Mungo, Uranga and TanzerEnactment No: H.A. 02-205.
